Founder & Principal Consultant - Business, Education, Technology

RZONZ was founded by Joe Frost to leverage his diverse business, education, and technical experience to help others attain success.Joe draws from a skill set developed over 25 years in opportunities ranging from dot.com to Fortune 500 and holds a Master’s degree in computer information systems.His favorite pro bono work was the development of a secure, educational technology website that combined social networking with office type software where students could learn appropriate use and develop proficiencies with current business applications.
IT Manager: Help Desk / Desktop Support

From support calls & trouble tickets to being highly accessible for those that just want to ask a technical question, we pride ourselves on being the HELPdesk whether in our offices or at your DESKTOP. We're here for you!

Prencipia is a company founded on principles of sustainability and stewardship. We look for solutions to problems facing our customers that exhibit financial responsibility, social responsibility, and environmental responsibility. We firmly believe solutions that meet these criteria will provide the most value in the long run. http://prencipia.com

Gaetan Simard
Lead Project Manager, CenturyLink / Aznet II
December 6, 2013, Gaetan worked with Joe Frost, in different groups

I've had the pleasure to work with Joe on a project during his time at the Department of Education. The project entailed the move of over 300 users from one location to a new location, and involved coordinating all activities as it relates to IT (servers, Desktops), Telecommunications (Voice, LAN, Wireless, WAN), Facilities (power, construction, cabling)  as well as managing the multiple vendors involved in the move. Prior to Joe coming on-board,the project was at a stand-still. Within a week of coming on-board Joe's passion and dedication quickly put the project back on-track and actually completed the project ahead of schedule.  He was particularly focused on his customers' strategic needs, ensuring all services provided by vendors met each of their respective needs, while maintaining an enthusiastic approach that ensured team participation and collaborative decisions. A pleasure to work with.

May 24, 2013, Joe Frost, worked with David in the same group

Joe is a highly valued skill set, not only is he well versed in Network Infrastructure, but he brings a sense of professionalism composure and business analytics to the project team and overall work environment that is shared with others. He is very articulate and can bring that technical jargon down to the business level, and communicate it across channels seamlessly. I highly recommend Mr. Frost for any client engagement that requires well thought out and logical work flows. This is what Joe brings to the table -Designed correctly,his infrastructure diagrams will support your overall business, transparently, without impact or notice to the overall profit and operation of your business.

May 23, 2013, Joe Frost, worked with Anne in the same group

I am happy to recommend him personally and professionally.  Joe was a respected and admired part of the Arizona Department of Education’s team.   He was able to successfully navigate many dynamic and extremely technically challenging architecture projects.  He always handled each challenge appropriately and elegantly—most of the time with a joke and smile in addition to his extensive technical expertise.  On a more personal note, Joe has a sparkling personality and wit that can’t help but to make those around him happy.  I would welcome the opportunity to work with Joe any time.

Simply put I could not have built my website without Clint Lenard. The complexity involved with building a private social network website for education was overwhelming, but Clint helped me pull it all together.  His expertise in PHP and MySQL was invaluable. summary: Technical leader with a Masters Degree in Computer Information Systems and over 25 years experience ranging from college campus technical support to Fortune 500 process improvement at Intel and Honeywell.High level project management experience including multi-million dollar state wide software implementation for National Computer Systems (Pearson) as well as large scale infrastructure & personnel projects for the AZ State Department of Education.Over a decade of experience as Director of Technology managing multiple sites while pursuing certification to become a trained communicator and an award winning state certified teacher.A visionary and strategist experienced at working with C-level executives as well as teams to document and execute measurable plans for success in a collaborative, team building, and dream manager fashion.
name: Joe Frost, MSCIS
title: Director of Technology
